pages.body:
# Kaffiene

Kaffiene is a [[search engine]] developed by [[Kaffie]] for [[ZeroNet]] [[zite|zites]]. It uses naive and [[regex]] queries to search through a plain-text index of sites along with hand-picked tags. The site freely shares its index and is [[cloneable]]. There are currently over 1185 sites listed in the index.

In [[April 23]], year of [[2017]], Kaffiene [has become open-source](/zeronews.bit/?Post:4:Kaffiene+is+now+open-source). 



## See also

* [[ZeroSearch]]
* [[Kidsearch]]
* [[bwoi]]
* [[Zearch]]


## External links

* [Official zite](/kaffiene.bit/) [ðŸ“Ž](/1Mr5rX9TauvaGReB4RjCaE6D37FJQaY5Ba)
* [on 0list](/0list.bit/?Topic:2_1NWh3WAty57FH8at1WtrZigMrdhrDkuPzh/Kaffiene+Search+Engine) [ðŸ“Ž](/186THqMWuptrZxq1rxzpguAivK3Bs6z84o/?Topic:2_1NWh3WAty57FH8at1WtrZigMrdhrDkuPzh/Kaffiene+Search+Engine)
* [developer blog (Kaffie)](/kaffie.bit/) [ðŸ“Ž](/1N6zp6jCXPBktNMPfe7UJBpQGyfCq7k2M8)

# Kaffiene

Kaffiene is a [[search engine]] developed by [[Kaffie]] for [[ZeroNet]] [[zite|zites]]. It uses naive and [[regex]] queries to search through a plain-text index of sites along with hand-picked tags. The site freely shares its index and is [[cloneable]]. There are currently over 1185 sites listed in the index.
In [[April 23]], year of [[2017]], Kaffiene [has become open-source](/zeronews.bit/?Post:4:Kaffiene+is+now+open-source). 



## See also

* [[ZeroSearch]]
* [[Kidsearch]]
* [[bwoi]]
* [[Zearch]]


## External links

* [Official zite](/kaffiene.bit/) [ðŸ“Ž](/1Mr5rX9TauvaGReB4RjCaE6D37FJQaY5Ba)
* [on 0list](/0list.bit/?Topic:2_1NWh3WAty57FH8at1WtrZigMrdhrDkuPzh/Kaffiene+Search+Engine) [ðŸ“Ž](/186THqMWuptrZxq1rxzpguAivK3Bs6z84o/?Topic:2_1NWh3WAty57FH8at1WtrZigMrdhrDkuPzh/Kaffiene+Search+Engine)

# Plasmmer

[Joined](/Me.Mkg20001.bit/?Post/1oranGeS2xsKZ4jVsu9SVttzgkYXu4k9v/15XeFY67fYKCKxQPfeo246ELto2Gff1hAe/1490848996) the [[ZeroMe]] social network on [[March 30]], [[2017]], and has since become the most active user for 8 days in a row. In [[April 11]] Plasmmer returned to become the most active user, after a moral/philosophy discussion with a user. Suggested a lot of missing resources that famous social networks have, and others that can be exclusive of ZeroMe. Plasmmer is also a owner in the ZeroNerds organization togheter [[mkg20001]].

He always argues that [[ZeroNet]] needs a balance between freedom and sensorship, through a democratic system in which everyone can propose changes and the majority of users should approve.
[Plasmmer believe in a future](/Me.Mkg20001.bit/?Post/1oranGeS2xsKZ4jVsu9SVttzgkYXu4k9v/15XeFY67fYKCKxQPfeo246ELto2Gff1hAe/1490998890) in which [[ants]] will have a powerfull brain and do communication with humans while living in [[ecosphere]]s.

## Creations
The proposed video format [[USV]] (Universal Smart Video), the game in development [[Tamigucho]] and the [[Kidsearch]] search engine. By the time this article was written, this user used the photo of the [[Dead Or Alive]] band frontman - [[Pete Burns]] - in his profile, of which he is a fan.
Plasmmer was born on [[April 9]], [[1997]] on [[Brazil]].

## External links
* [ZeroMe profile](/Me.Mkg20001.bit/?Profile/1oranGeS2xsKZ4jVsu9SVttzgkYXu4k9v/15XeFY67fYKCKxQPfeo246ELto2Gff1hAe/plasmmer@zeroid.bit)
* [Blog](/plasmmer.bit/)
* [Videos](/tube.plasmmer.bit/)
* [Other profiles](/plasmmer.bit/?Post:2:My+ZeroMe+profiles/)

# Mkg20001

User that introduced codes on [[ZeroMe]] to support background images/colors in users' profiles. Also, created ZeroNet for Android and is owner of ZeroNerds organization togheter [[Plasmmer]]. [Joined ZeroMe](/Me.Mkg20001.bit/?Post/1BLueGvui1GdbtsjcKqCf4F67uKfritG49/177ia43eQrnWCHCWt1ik6viQGRzWuNXGzD/1) on [[Nov 16]], [[2016]]. Was born on [[Mar 08]], [[2001]].

## External links

# Universal Smart Video format (USV)

USV (Universal Smart Video), as the name says, is a format for smart/interactive videos. We can call it "the video of the future". Do you imagine if we have the power of YT's videos in a file on our devices? A USV file can have credits to the authors, multiple language subtitles/audios, indicative rating, tags, etc. All it embedded into a single video file! A .USV file is just a compressed archive (.7z) with the extension changed.

## External links
* [Official zite](/usvformat.bit/)
* [Blog](/blog.usvformat.bit/)

# Tamigucho
A game in development by [[Plasmmer]]. Accourding to its [profile](/Me.Mkg20001.bit/?Profile/1oranGeS2xsKZ4jVsu9SVttzgkYXu4k9v/19mjEz66HUSJrB1H3ZqaZK9BwCMm9sX6aj/tamigucho@zeroid.bit), Tamigucho is a game/app with collectionable fictional creatures that can be pets or used in fights.

# Kidsearch
[[Search engine]] created by [[Plasmmer]] with family-safe and kid-directioned content, based on [[Kaffiene]].

The site freely shares its index and is [[cloneable]]. There are currently over 1185 sites listed in the index.

# Bwoi

Bwoi is a music sharing platform built from the Bwoi search engine.  It is currently a work-in-progress site.

You can find Bwoi at [bwoi.bit](http://127.0.0.1:43110/bwoi.bit/).

## Features

Some of Bwoi's features include: A picture of a fucking dog and that's it.  Why?

## Developer
The creator and developer of Bwoi is LetsRaceBwoi.  His ZeroID is Bwoi.  He can be found on various other sites, such as Discord (LetsRaceBwoi) and Twitter [@LetsRaceBwoi](http://www.twitter.com/letsracebwoi/).

## See also
* [[Kaffiene]]
* [[Kidsearch]]
* [[ZeroSearch]]
* [[Zearch]]

# ZeroSearch

ZeroSearch is the first [[search engine]] for [[ZeroNet]] [[zite]]s. It uses naive queries to search through a plain-text index of [[zite]]s along with hand-picked tags. As of Sunday, 5th June, 2016 there are over 606 [[zite]]s listed in the index.



## See also

* [[Kaffiene]]
* [[Kidsearch]]
* [[bwoi]]
* [[Zearch]]

# Universal Smart Video format (USV)

USV (Universal Smart Video), as the name says, is a format for smart/interactive videos. We can call it "the video of the future". Do you imagine if we have the power of YT's videos in a file on our devices? A USV file can have credits to the authors, multiple language subtitles/audios, indicative rating, tags, etc. All it embedded into a single video file! A .USV file is just a compressed archive (.7z) with the extension changed.

## External links
* [Official zite](http://127.0.0.1:43110/1HDMywbRZkin9HhmheaDFHCzaZhCfLhZLH/)

# ZeroSearch

ZeroSearch is the first [[search engine]] for [[ZeroNet]] [[zite]]s. It uses naive queries to search through a plain-text index of [[zite]]s along with hand-picked tags. As of Sunday, 5th June, 2016 there are over 606 [[zite]]s listed in the index.



## See also

* [[Kaffiene]]
* [[bwoi]]
* [[Zearch]]

# Kaffiene

Kaffiene is a [[search engine]] developed by [[Kaffie]] for [[ZeroNet]] [[zite]]s. It uses naive and [[regex]] queries to search through a plain-text index of sites along with hand-picked tags. The site freely shares its index and is [[cloneable]]. There are currently over 1185 sites listed in the index.



## See also

* [[bwoi]]
* [[ZeroSearch]]
* [[Zearch]]
* [[Kidsearch]]

# Mkg20001

User that introduced codes on [[ZeroMe]] to support background images/colors in users' profiles. [Joined ZeroMe](http://127.0.0.1:43110/Me.Mkg20001.bit/?Post/1BLueGvui1GdbtsjcKqCf4F67uKfritG49/177ia43eQrnWCHCWt1ik6viQGRzWuNXGzD/1) on [[Nov 16]], [[2016]]. Was born on [[Mar 08]], [[2001]].

# ZeroMe
ZeroMe is the social network of ZeroNet, made by [[Nofish]]. Users can share texts and photos; and comment on posts of other profiles. Users can also follow other users and hit like button in posts. In a proposal by [[Mkg20001]], users will can also use a background image/color in his profiles.

# Tamigucho
A game in development by [[Plasmmer]]. Accourding to its [profile](http://127.0.0.1:43110/Me.Mkg20001.bit/?Profile/1oranGeS2xsKZ4jVsu9SVttzgkYXu4k9v/19mjEz66HUSJrB1H3ZqaZK9BwCMm9sX6aj/tamigucho@zeroid.bit), Tamigucho is a game/app with collectionable fictional creatures that can be pets or used in fights.
